content:
**Sai Pratyusha Gorapalli** -- Data Scientist & Analytics Professional

Based in St. Louis, Missouri with 3+ years of experience building ML pipelines, predictive models, and analytics dashboards across 5 industries: healthcare, finance, marketing, IoT, and cybersecurity.

Currently completing M.S. in Data Analytics at Webster University (expected May 2026).
Open to full-time data science and analytics roles -- remote, hybrid, or on-site.

**Education** -- 3 degrees, 2 countries:

**M.S. Data Analytics** -- Webster University, St. Louis (2023-2026)
Machine learning, statistical modeling, modern data science methods.

**MBA, Technology Management** -- Osmania University, India (2020-2022)
Business strategy, stakeholder communication, tech leadership.

**B.Tech, Electrical & Electronics** -- Osmania University, India (2016-2020)
Math foundations, systems thinking, quantitative rigor.

**Work Experience:**

**Graduate Research Assistant** -- Osmania University (Jan-Dec 2022)
Cybersecurity and data analytics research.

**Independent Data Analyst** (Jan 2021 - Feb 2022)
Power BI dashboards, SQL pipelines, KPI reporting for clients.

**Data Analyst Intern** -- Smart Bridge / IBM (May-Jun 2019)
IoT security systems, RFID data collection using C/C++.

Highlights: processed 622K+ records, built end-to-end ML pipelines, delivered insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders.

**Programming Languages:**

**Python** (92%) -- ML pipelines with scikit-learn, pandas, TensorFlow, PyTorch
**SQL** (90%) -- Complex ETL with MySQL, PostgreSQL, Azure SQL, MS SQL Server
**R** (85%) -- Statistical analysis, time series with forecast/ggplot2/Shiny
Also comfortable with Java and C/C++ from full-stack and embedded systems work.

**Machine Learning & AI:**

Supervised: Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, Logistic Regression
Deep Learning: CNNs, RNNs, Transformers (TensorFlow/PyTorch/Keras)
NLP: BERT, RoBERTa, NLTK, SpaCy
Time Series: ETS, TBATS, ARIMA, STL decomposition

Strong in feature engineering, PCA, and model evaluation (AUC-ROC, R-squared, confusion matrices). Currently expanding into LLMs, agentic AI, generative AI, and MLOps.

**Cloud & Tools:**

Cloud: Azure ML, Azure SQL, Blob Storage, Azure DevOps, Databricks, Spark
Visualization: Power BI (DAX, Power Query), Tableau, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
Infrastructure: Docker, REST APIs, Airflow, CI/CD pipelines
Day-to-day: Git/GitHub, Jupyter Notebooks, VS Code, RStudio

Certified: **Microsoft Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100)**, January 2026.

**Applied Time Series Forecasting**
Built 8+ forecasting models in R (ETS, TBATS, STL, ARIMA). Analyzed retail sales, energy consumption, and economic indicators. Focused on seasonal decomposition, trend extraction, and forecast accuracy.

**COVID-19 Mortality Prediction**
End-to-end ML pipeline in Python processing 622K+ records. Random Forest regression with feature engineering to identify key mortality predictors. Translated pandemic data into actionable public health insights.

**Mortgage Payback Analytics**
Analyzed 622K+ loan-month records to predict mortgage payoff behavior. Combined logistic regression and Random Forest with macroeconomic features. Key finding: lower loan-to-value ratios + rising housing prices significantly increase payoff probability.

**Software Mailing Response Analytics**
Ranked 50K+ customers into response deciles using logistic regression in R. Achieved AUC of 0.902. Applied PCA for dimensionality reduction and built targeting recommendations to optimize direct mail campaign ROI.

**Smartphone Resale Price Prediction**
Built regression and classification models in R from 3,400+ listings. R-squared of 0.78, classification accuracy of 86%. Feature engineering with device age, brand encoding, and condition scoring.

**NEXUS -- Local AI Research Agent**
Commercial-grade AI research agent in Python running entirely on local hardware. 35+ commands, 8 expert personas, 7-phase research pipeline. Uses Ollama for local LLM inference, SearXNG for private meta-search, ChromaDB for persistent knowledge. Rivals Perplexity Pro at zero API cost with full data privacy.

**rag0 -- In-Browser RAG Search Engine**
Complete retrieval-augmented generation pipeline running entirely in the browser. Uses all-MiniLM-L6-v2 via Transformers.js for embeddings (~50ms/query), in-memory vector store with cosine similarity, and SmolLM2-135M for WebGPU text generation. Zero servers, zero API keys. Powers the Ask My Portfolio feature on this site.

**American Ninja Warrior -- Power BI Dashboard**
Interactive multi-page dashboard analyzing obstacle patterns, competition structure, and geography across 10 seasons. 4 pages with DAX measures, Bing Maps visualization, and drill-down slicers.

**Data Visualization with Tableau**
Portfolio of interactive dashboards including World Bike Sales (global performance, regional trends) and Sales Performance analysis. Built with business storytelling principles, interactive filters, calculated fields, and KPI cards.

**Multi-Container Docker Application**
Containerized full-stack Todo app with Node.js, Express, MongoDB via Docker Compose. Production and dev configurations, Docker networking with DNS resolution, optimized Dockerfiles. Published to Docker Hub.

**Certifications:**

**Microsoft Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100)** -- January 2026
Designing and implementing ML solutions on Azure.

**Python for Data Science & ML Bootcamp** -- Udemy, October 2024

**Java Full Stack Development** -- Sathya Technologies, May 2023

**Statistical Tests for Research** -- HCDC, June 2023

**Embedded Systems for IoT** -- Smart Bridge / IBM, June 2019

**Currently Learning:**

Large Language Models and transformer architectures
MLOps and model deployment pipelines
Cloud architecture on AWS (adding to Azure foundation)
Generative AI and agentic workflows
Apache Spark and Databricks for distributed computing

Recent hands-on: NEXUS (local AI research agent), rag0 (this in-browser RAG engine), Docker deployments, Power BI and Tableau dashboards.

**Contact:**

Email: sgorapalli@webster.edu
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/pratyusha-g-a92915229
GitHub: github.com/Pratyusha108
Kaggle: kaggle.com/saipgorapalli
LeetCode: leetcode.com/u/sai_pratyusha_gorapalli
Hugging Face: huggingface.co/pratyushagorapalli

Based in St. Louis, Missouri. Open to remote, hybrid, and on-site roles. Authorized to work in the United States.

**How This RAG System Works:**

This runs entirely in your browser -- no APIs, no servers, no data leaves your device.

**Embedding:** all-MiniLM-L6-v2 model (~23MB) via Transformers.js converts text to vectors.
**Retrieval:** In-memory vector store with cosine similarity finds the most relevant knowledge chunks.
**Generation:** If your browser supports WebGPU, SmolLM2 generates natural answers. Otherwise, it returns retrieved content directly.

The knowledge base contains curated chunks about my background, projects, and skills.
